Good Comments: Pure awesomeness. Fast with their subbing and the fonts were nice.
good quality, got the job done fast
Bad Comments: Nice job. The Tacos karaoke was a nice touch ^^
Consistent high quality and good translation.

Good Comments: great use of fonts for some of the episodes
Overly "cute" alpha timing, nonexistent subtitle margins, awkward, overliteral writing. And if you believe for w/e that .mkvs shouldn't be hardsubbed... these are 100% hardsubbed.
They actually did it! They were damned fast once they got started, and they were generally quality.
Great subs. I wish they are an active group.
The subs were consistently understandable, unobtrusive, and grammatically correct. That's all you could want in a sub, right?
Bad Comments: THEY ROCK. SIMPLY AWESOME AND FAST
Besides being almost the only group that's subbed Hitohira, their subs are good for a new group.

Too often these subs read like they just took what their translator wrote and didn't even have anyone edit/QC it. Literally correct, but not how anyone actually speaks English. Solid number of typos, too.
The subtitles were at the right speed :)

Good Comments: Coalgirls, gg, ANE, so many better alternatives out there.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Wellber no Monogatari: Sisters of Wellber

Good Comments: They were the only ones that completed it. Just now.
Bad Comments: Great looking font, nice and clean.
They've already released 10 episodes. :] Can't wait for the last ones.
Accurate from what Japanese I know. Some big timing issues on ep 11-13, though. :(

Good Comments: HD, good english, nice-looking typesetting, no typos
comparable with yesy. both have their flaws here and there. hm. i just have to see which group sub faster =P
Bad Comments: They were doing great, until they dropped the project ¬¬
